channel.title: Nims Hindi Machine Translation on Linguistrix

item.title: Kripayaa Samjho!
item.description: Back in November, I discussed what happened when Tom Cruise used machine translation to connect to his Indians fans.Â Since I am in Japan, I come across bad English translations on a daily basis. I hadn’t posted any on Linguistrix because Chinglish/Janglish is very common stuff and you get them dime by the dozen. But today I found this one that is incomprehensible in at least two languages (I have to check up my Chinese friend to find out whether it makes any more sense in Chinese than it does in English/Hindi.
